description: The goal of this course is to learn how to teach vocabulary effectively. Upon course completion, you will learn how to teach vocabulary to improve reading comprehension in your students. Materials needed will be a computer with internet accessibility and programs to download PDF files. This course can be completed in 90 minutes to 2 hours. The course is structured with videos, presentations, quizzes and assignments to be uploaded into the question section for peer-to-peer collaboration. The instructor will be available weekly, weekly for course interaction.
title: How To Teach Vocabulary Instruction
